description: This file is an HTML webpage that provides a graphical user interface for browsing and visualizing database tables and their data. It contains embedded CSS styles and JavaScript code to handle fetching data from API endpoints and dynamically rendering database, table, and row information.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets the UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and renders the list of tables for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data from the selected table, rendering it into an interactive table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates the HTML for the data table based on fetched rows.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual cell content, handling nulls, objects, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Toggles expanded view for cell content to show full text or object JSON.
